Errors.FormInvalid: The form is incorrectly filled in
Errors.FirstNameRequired: Fill in the fist name field
Errors.LastNameRequired: Fill in the last name field
Errors.UserNameRequired: Fill in the user name field
Errors.ConfirmPasswordRequired: Fill in the confirm password field
Errors.PasswordMinLength: The password must have a minimum of 8 characters
Errors.SomethingWrong: Something has gone wrong. Try again later
Errors.UserNameAlreadyExist: The user name is already in use
Errors.NonAlphanumeric: The password must contain one special character
Errors.PasswordRequiresDigit: The password must contain at least one digit
Errors.PasswordRequiresUpper: Your password must contain at least one capital letter
Errors.Project_Not_Found: We were unable to find your project in the database
Errors.User_Has_No_Access_To_This_Project: You do not have access to this project. Please contact the administrator
Errors.DoesntPremission: You do not have access. Please contact the administrator.

Board.EmptyUserProjects: You are not assigned to any project. Create one or ask the administrator to add you to a project.

Sprint.DataError: The start date cannot be later than the end date.
Sprint.EmptySprints: There are no sprints in this project. Add them using the button.
